title: Syndrome.MULTi8-PROPHET
description:
Syndrome  (c) Camel 101

release date ...: October 2769
protection .....: Steam
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/RU/PT

You wake up dazed and confused, probably  from  the
effects of cryosleep. No one can  be  seen  around,
but you soon start to find the bodies of your  dead
crewmen. The ship  is  adrift,  and  whoever  -  or
whatever - killed your crewmates is probably  still
around.

Syndrome is a  sci-fi  survival  horror  game  that
takes place aboard the "Valkenburg", an exploration
and science ship equipped with  the  most  advanced
systems in the Novacore fleet.

You need to find out what happened to your  crewmen
and do whatever you can to survive this  nightmare.
The enemies are powerful and numerous, which  means
that  stealth  and  evasion  are  often  the   best
strategy. You'll find weapons aboard the ship,  but
ammo is scarce and should be wisely spent.

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
The game version is v1.03f.
Files on Steam for Windows version of this game
(for all languages) have almost 67,5GB. We have
packed them to 3,72GB. Thats less than  initial
CODEX english-only release
